about_the_game:
You control a Cyber Seeker.

Cyber Seekers are bots used to complete high-risk bounties. You are tasked with destroying a legion of bots who have gone rogue and taken over a city. Start every run with limited resources. Receive credits for each bot you destroy and use them to upgrade your bot.

The city is your playground.

Cyber Seekers are equipped with various abilities and can traverse any terrain. Run on walls, grapple, glide and shoot your way through a city under fire. You will find random weapons, ability cards, and programs in each run, making them unique. Choose whatever combination that suits your playstyle.
If your bot gets destroyed, you will lose all your weapons, abilities and credits but retain some core upgrades that will be installed in a new bot. With each run, your Seeker Bot becomes more powerful.

Use modules to gain different abilities.

Hidden within the city are crates containing a unique module or a weapon with random stats. These can give your Cyber Seeker an edge against other bots. Higher-level crates are unlocked when enough bots are destroyed. Cyber Stations provide upgrades in exchange for credits to enhance your weapons further.

Become a superior Seeker Bot.

If a particular run does not go as planned, you can salvage your current Seeker Bot to get a better Bot for the next run. Encounter new enemy bots by defeating other Seeker Bots, change your strategy, and experience the thrill of becoming a superior Cyber Seeker.

Tons of ways to traverse the city.

Some unique modules will change the way you traverse the city. Each new area has unique enemies and abilities to offer. Complete various traversal challenges to gain points required to upgrade your bot.

name: Cyber Seekers: Conquest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160, 3.6 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Play as a bot for hire and complete contracts in a Third-Person traversal shooter with Rogue Lite mechanics. Run on walls and use your grapple gun to traverse and hunt down rogue bots who have conquered a city.
